function fun_balance(
                                            parm_code_comb_id   in number,
                                            parm_set_of_book_id in number,
                                            parm_generation_date in date,
                                            parm_period_type     in varchar2,
                                            parm_opbal_yn       in number,
                                            parm_monetary_stat  in varchar2,
                                            parm_bal_type       in varchar2
                                            )                                   return number is
   -- if parameter is for monetary currency then this cursor is used       
   
   parm_balance  number:=0;
   parm_from_date date;
   parm_to_date   date;
   parm_adj_prd_id number:=0;
                                                                                    
   cursor cur_jrn_mt_monetary(parm_cur_from_date  date,
                              parm_cur_to_date    date,
                              parm_curr_id        number,
                              parm_bal_type       varchar2) is
          select journal_id
          from   journal_mt
          where  (jrn_date between parm_cur_from_date and parm_cur_to_date)
          and    currency_id <> parm_curr_id
          and    balance_type = parm_bal_type
          order by journal_id;
